publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3620# Donald Gorrie: Council Tax on Second Homes-That the Parliament considers that the Scottish Executive should give local authorities the power to charge council tax in full on second homes.

S1M-3620# Donald Gorrie: Council Tax on Second Homesâ€”That the Parliament considers that the Scottish Executive should give local authorities the power to charge council tax in full on second homes. Supported by: Ms Sandra White*
